# Package Manager

The core of the plugin system.

---

## Browser Process & Renderer Process

---

### package.send(name, message, ...args)

- `name`: (`string`) The package name
- `message`: (`string`) The message name
- `...args`: (`any[]`) Arguments

Sends a message to a specific plugin.

```typescript
package.send('test', 'test-message', true);
```

---

### package.broadcast(message, ...args)

- `message`: (`string`) The message name
- `...args`: (`any[]`) Arguments

Broadcasts a message to all plugins.

```typescript
package.broadcast('test-message', true);
```

---

### package.reload(name)

- `name`: (`string`) The package name

Reloads a plugin.

```typescript
package.reload('test');
```

---

## Browser Process

### async package.register(path)

- `path`: (`string`) The package path

Registers a folder as a plugin and adds it to the plugin manager.

```typescript
await package.register('xx/xx/test');
```

---

### async package.unregister(path)

- `path`: (`string`) The package path

Removes a plugin directory from the manager.

```typescript
await package.unregister('xx/xx/test');
```

---

### package.find(name)

- `name`: (`string`) The package name

Finds a plugin with the specified name and returns a plugin object.

```typescript
package.find('test');
```

---

### package.debugRely(file)

- `file`: (`string`) Absolute path of the file

Starts debugging the JS files that the plugin depends on in debug mode.

```typescript
package.debugRely('xx/xxx/test.js');
```

---
